verse.name: v1
verse.lines: When I was a little boy, so me mother told me, Tammy. Way haul away, we'll haul away Joe.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: That if I did not kiss the girls, my lips would all grow moldy Tammy Way haul away, we'll haul away Joe.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Now way haul away, the good ship now is rolling Tammy Way haul away, we'll haul away Joe.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: King Louis was the king of France, before the rev-o-lu-shy-ann Way haul away, we'll haul away Joe.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: And then he got his head cut off, it spoiled his-con-sti-tu-shy-ann. Way haul away, we'll haul away Joe.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Now first I met a Yankee girl and she was fat and lazy, Tammy Way haul away, we'll haul away Joe.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: And then I met an Irish girl, she damn near drove me crazy Way haul away, we'll haul away Joe.

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: Now way haul away, we're bound for better weather Tammy. Way haul away, we'll haul away Joe.
